data.description:
Become a world class driver in your very own high-speed Formula race car! FormulaX is here to push your driving to the limit:

üèÅ REALISTIC FORMULA RACING üèÅ

- Feel the rush of Formula-style race cars with cutting-edge realistic driving mechanics.
- Hug those hairpin turns, following the race line and overpassing your opponents! 
- As you accelerate, you'll feel the engine roar beneath you

üîß STRATEGIC PITSTOPS üîß
- As your tires wear down, you'll need to make crucial decisions ‚Äì when to pit and change tires can make or break your victory.

ü•á GLOBAL COMPETITION ü•á üîú

- Join the world's elite racers in high-stakes multiplayer races.
- Compete against players from every corner of the globe, testing your skills and strategy in intense races.

‚è±Ô∏è SOLO CHALLENGES ‚è±Ô∏è

- Practice your skills in single-player mode, where you can race against the clock or bots and test your limits in time trials.

üèéÔ∏è CUSTOMIZE YOUR RACE MACHINE üèéÔ∏è

- Customize every aspect of your racing machine, from the engine to the paint job, and make it truly your own.
-Different Car parts effect your driving mechanics!

üõ£Ô∏è CONQUER LEGENDARY CIRUITS üõ£Ô∏è

- FormulaX offers you the chance to master 10 iconic race circuits, each with its unique challenges and surprises.
- Feel the history and prestige of these legendary tracks as you aim for the checkered flag.

Get ready to experience the peak of VR Formula racing in FormulaX! So, rev up your engines, hit the track, and show the world what it takes to be a FormulaX champion!
